channel.title: Matrix client and server
channel.description:
high guys i am back for some more action in the rsps world i recently heard that matrix rsps has closed i think i almost dead when i heard this that was the only server i ever thought kept it self up to date and you didnt have to rely on voting to get you anywere (well anywere cool :P)
so the real reason i am here is to ask if anyone would happen to have the last client and source of matrix (working of course) i am a high end modeler and i am working models for 700+ clients so i am in need of this and yes it has to be matrix cuse it was coded with a special file for customs
now if you waisted you time reading all of that please post the links below
tnk you guys again :)

item.title: Matrix client and server
item.description:
@308507631 wrote:

[quote=“Savions Sw, post:4, topic:458816”]’‘i got the permision of dragonkk’’

Nobody has, ‘‘you did not finish reading what dragonkk said’’

And by the way, fix it yourself, i did it too.[/quote] Stop trying to be a dick to others when you post 200 times a day in one section… spamming for help. Gtfo.

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix client and server
item.dc:creator: @dd123c5 dd123c5
item.description:
@dd123c5 wrote:

kk i understand that you did not finish reading what i said IT IS TO TEST MY HIGH POLY MODELS AND MATRIX IS THE ONLY EASY ONE THAT I FOUND TO ADD CUSTOM MODELS TOO so as i said before just finish reading next time

tnk you and have a nice day

o and i got permission from Dragonkk to use it he just wont give it to me cuse he didnt have the newest one that came out

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix client and server
item.dc:creator: @Savions_Sw Savions Sw
item.description:
@Savions_Sw wrote:

To be fair, i dont want another leecher.

We got like 50 leechers now, i can´t take it anymore.

If you really want a working Matrix source and client, fix it yourself, if you cant do that just dont start on it.

Read full topic
